Description: Rim and body sherd of North Ionian pottery lotus bowl; glaze fired orange; interior glazed; exterior: part of pendent lotus flower and a large dot; narrow band painted at top of rim; inscription cut over frieze.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 307)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 669, no. 268)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.583)
